ygData.subject: Re: Wrath of the Mighty
ygData.msgSnippet: KSL is going on a short vacation and is leaving me in control of all his bots except for Vehement untill he gets back (he had to leave before he could post

KSL is going on a short vacation and is leaving me in control of all 
his bots except for Vehement untill he gets back (he had to leave 
before he could post that, but I can send the IM if you guys want).

Prodigy, if you do something like that again without properly posting 
it, I will void it. You have to post the talking AP to be a hologram 
and that the other AP was somewhere else, or else it turns out to be 
plain lying in posts, which is unacceptable. I'll accept it this 
time, but be more careful in the future.


::FZ/Perndabot/Prowl/Kluster/Grimmler/Firearm/Proto/Deamon Wulf/Flesh 
Ripper/Dark Claw/Double Punch/Injector/Manterror/Bumblebee/Nemesis 
Enforcer/Scattershot/Unitron/Firestarter/Choran/Imprisoner/Predator::

At Angel Prime's 'warning', FZ dives to the side, evading the blade. 
He stumbles back from a fireball and ducks under the rest.

"Foolish decision, Maximal. If you survive this battle, know that 
every last one of your faction killed after this point is your fault 
and no one else's. Your leader tried to save the group, you have 
doomed them."

He fires a missile from his launcher at Angel Prime. Before hitting 
(whether it was going to hit or not), the missile exploded into its 
energy-draining field, 6 feet in diameter. Anything in that field 
would be drained of energy.

"Alliance members," he says into his comm, now on an Alliance 
frequency, "kill the Maximals that are firing at you. We'll see if 
the others join in, but they most likely will. In that case, kill 
them all. Take no prisoners."

Sending a seperate batch of orders to Unitron, who was inside the 
base, FZ fires another missile at Angel Prime, also detonating it 
before impact.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl's eyes widen slightly as he sees Angel Prime's group open fire 
on the Alliance, and the Alliance retaliate with a superior amount of 
firepower. Angel Prime was gonna get them killed!

-Damn him!- he thinks to himself, turning to Iron Raptor. "Do we help 
Arcangel, love?"

Kluster and his group also turn to her, waiting for orders.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Perndabot pulls out his missile launcher, firing two missiles at 
Icedragon.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Manterror, though damaged, lifted his claws, firing eight ion disks 
in all at Angel Prime.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bumblebee aims his missile launcher at Fury and fires two missiles. 
The Maximals were stupid indeed to fight right now.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
His stinger missile launcher out of ammo, Injector pulls a pistol 
from subspace, firing three shots at Depth Charge.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Double Punch smiles as some Maximals open fire. He liked battle.

He fires two signature seeking missiles at Icedragon, as well as 
firing a stream of poison at the bot from his tail.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Nemesis Enforcer almost cheers at the fact that the battle was 
reborn. Instead, he jumps into the air, firing two dozen shots with 
his rapid-fire rifle at Depth Charge.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"YUPPPIE!" Scattershot yells and jumps into the air, throwing down 
two charges at Angel Prime.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"Fool," Deamon Wulf remarks, aiming his blade at Angel Prime. The 
blade launches off the handle, flying at Angel Prime like a missile. 
Another blade quickly replaced the first on the handle. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Flesh Ripper smiles, opening his mouth and firing three fireballs 
from it at Depth Charge.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Dark Claw holds his palms close, a blue orb forming inbetween them. 
He throws the orb, which explodes like a grenade, at Fury.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The brig doors slide aside and Firestarter enters, followed by 
Unitron.

"Zardus sent new orders," Unitron remarks drily. "We are to find the 
power source and be prepared to destroy this ship. He also sent us 
the means by which we'll do it without being killed."

Firestarter nods, looking around at the bots in the brig. "You will 
all help us. Follow me," he states and turns, heading down a hallway. 
Unitron hands Choran, Imprisoner, and Predator a laser pistol each 
and follows, the three bounty hunters following also.







--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (Firefox, are the shields of the CF down or up?  Also, how is 
anyone having 
> the Key to Vector Sigma?  It was destroyed by Silverbolt in the G1 
episodes 
> and BM hasn't happened, so I'm at a loss.  Could someone explain?)
> 
> The Oblitercons/The Protectobots:
> 
> 
> 
> Dark One was in his hover and cursed at the idiocy of the 
Maximals.  There 
> were only several resisting the decision to end the fighting, but 
they were 
> enough to make Dark One angry.
> 
> "Oblitercons, this is Dark One, open fire on every last Maximal who 
fired 
> those shots!  Don't rest until they're dead or I say otherwise!  
Only focus 
> on them!"
> 
> He loaded up his missiles, firing off 25 laser blasts from his 
nosecone down 
> at Angel Prime.
> 
> ---
> 
> Breakdown raised his grenade launcher, firing off two grenades set 
to explode 
> on impact at Blade Runner after receiving his leader's orders.
> 
> ---
> 
> Pyro was pulled out of the mud in time to hear Dark One's 
orders.  "Blasted 
> Maxis..." he said as he powered up his optic weapons, firing off 
five rapid 
> blasts at Depth Charge.
> 
> ---
> 
> Hiss made a strange look at his hands as they were covered in mud, 
his 
> expression changing to anger at Dark One's information and watching 
Angel 
> Prime's spectacle.
> 
> "Damn Maximals are making us look good by betraying the cease 
fire!" he 
> laughed, firing off four blasts from his fusion cannon at Icedragon.
> 
> ---
> 
> Scavenger raised his chain gun, firing off 25 armor-piercing rounds 
at Fury's 
> abdomen.  "Take that you treacherous fools!"
> 
> ===
> 
> Hot Spot looked up, seeing Angel Prime.  "You stupid...Screw you!" 
he yelled. 
>   He wasn't going to help him.  The sooner the battle ended the 
sooner his 
> near dead comrades could get help.  He knelt back down, welding.
> 
> ---
> 
> Groove gave a nasty glare at Angel Prime, standing to his feet and 
keeping 
> his weapon ready.  If it broke out into all out war he'd be ready.
> 
> ---
> 
> First Aid layed on the ground, mech-fluid bubblling out of his nose 
and
